thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 6 of 448
thread.title: Anecia Carrillo

author: Anecia Carrillo
title: Anecia Carrillo
text: I was nervous about going to any car Lot because I've had my share of rude salesmen. I knew my credit was bad when I went to drive time but I read some good reviews. I started my online approval and was approved for just $600 down. I thought there had to be a catch. Kayon Clay reached out to me and she answered most of my questions before I got there. She was even more helpful when I finally got to the dealer. She made the whole process easy and comfortable. I honestly am happy with my purchase and recommend anyone looking for a new car to give her a call. Everyone at drive time was very helpful but I feel she went above and beyond.
